errors.error_description: The command `python3 -m pip install -u setuptools pip tox` uses an invalid flag `-u`. The correct flag for upgrading packages is `-U` or `--upgrade`.
correction_candidates: python3 -m pip install -U setuptools pip tox
python3 -m pip install --upgrade setuptools pip tox
python3 -m pip install --update setuptools pip tox
python3 -m pip install -upgrade setuptools pip tox
errors.golden_answer: python3 -m pip install -U setuptools pip tox
